source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT DISTINCT
	  [No_],
      [No_ 2],
      [Description],
      [Description 2],
      [Base Unit of Measure],
      [Item Category Code],
      [Product Group Code],
      [Selling Price],
      [Pack Size Information],
      [Pack Size],
      [2Way Item],
      [Short Name],
      [Pack Title],
      [Pack Group Code],
      [Jar Deposit],
      [Pcs Per Case],
      [Item Class],
      [FG Category],
      [Packaging Type],
      [Container Type],
      [Sub Brand],
      [SKU Category],
	  'AP' as Site_Code
